sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Profile: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); if (!user) { return (

Profile Not Found

Please log in to view your profile.

); } const profileSections = [ { title: 'Personal Information', items: [ { label: 'Full Name', value: user.name }, { label: 'Phone Number', value: user.phoneNumber }, { label: 'Date of Birth', value: user.dateOfBirth }, { label: 'Age', value: `${user.age} years` }, { label: 'Gender', value: user.gender.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + user.gender.slice(1) }, ] }, { title: 'Location Details', items: [ { label: 'State', value: user.state }, { label: 'City', value: user.city }, { label: 'Address', value: user.address }, ] }, { title: 'Professional Information', items: [ { label: 'Occupation', value: user.occupation.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + user.occupation.slice(1) }, { label: 'Annual Income', value: `â‚¹${user.annualIncome.toLocaleString()}` }, ] }, { title: 'Government Documents', items: [ { label: 'Aadhaar Number', value: user.aadhaarNumber ? `**** **** ${user.aadhaarNumber.slice(-4)}` : 'Not provided' }, { label: 'PAN Number', value: user.panNumber || 'Not provided' }, ] }, { title: 'Account Status', items: [ { label: 'Profile Completion', value: user.profileCompleted ? 'Complete' : 'Incomplete' }, { label: 'Verification Status', value: user.isVerified ? 'Verified' : 'Pending' }, ] } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

My Profile

Manage your personal information and account settings

{user.name.charAt(0)}
{/* Profile Status Cards */}

Profile Status

{user.profileCompleted ? 'Complete' : 'Incomplete'}

{user.profileCompleted ? 'All information provided' : 'Missing information'}

Verification

{user.isVerified ? 'Verified' : 'Pending'}

{user.isVerified ? 'Identity confirmed' : 'Verification in progress'}

Documents

{[user.aadhaarNumber, user.panNumber].filter(Boolean).length} / 2

Documents linked

{/* Profile Information */}
{profileSections.map((section, index) => (

{section.title}

{section.items.map((item, itemIndex) => (
{item.label} {item.value}
))}
))}
{/* Action Buttons */}

Profile Actions

{/* Help Section */}

Need Help?

If you need assistance updating your profile or have questions about document verification, our support team is here to help.

); }; export default Profile;
